connect.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your keystore file

rebalance.empty: This portfolio is empty. To begin swapping you must <1>add a wallet</1> first.
rebalance.instructions2: Drag a slider left to decrease weight of an asset. Use
rebalance.instructions4: Drag a slider right to increase weight of an asset. Use
rebalance.instructions5: to add a new asset.<1/><2>(Note: To increase weight, you must have decreased weight of another asset)</2>

widget.omitted: <0>When omitted, a variable market rate is used.</0>
widget.approxSend: <0>Approximately how much you need to send. Click Create to receive a guaranteed quote.</0>
widget.expectSend: <0>The amount we expect you to send.</0>
widget.approxReceive: <0>Approximately how much you will receive. Click Create to receive a guaranteed quote.</0>
widget.guaranteeReceive: <0>The amount you are guaranteed to receive.</0>
widget.acceptTerms: I accept the <1> Faa.st Terms & Conditions</1>

swapSubmit.geoLimit: Send amount cannot be greater than $<1></1> <2>due to your location.</2>
swapSubmit.multipleSwaps: The following swaps will take place to save the changes you made to your portfolio. Please review them and click '<1></1>' to proceed.
swapSubmit.timer: * Quoted rates are guaranteed if submitted within:

ethInstructions.confirm: Please confirm the following transaction details when prompted by your wallet.

blocked.sorry: Sorry, you are accessing faa.st from a blocked location. If you are getting this message in error, you can learn more <1>here.</1>

walletInfoModal.metamask1: <0></0> is a desktop browser extension that provides an Ethereum wallet. You can get it <2>here.</2>
walletInfoModal.metamask2: If you already have <1></1>, ensure the extension is enabled on this browser.
walletInfoModal.mist1: <0></0> is a desktop web browser with a built-in Ethereum wallet. You can get it <2>here.</2>
walletInfoModal.mist2: If you already have <1></1>, open <3>faa.st</3> using its built in web browser.
walletInfoModal.status1: <0></0> is a mobile Ethereum OS for iOS and Android. You can learn more about it <2>here.</2>
walletInfoModal.status2: If you already have <1></1>, open <3>faa.st</3> using its built in web browser.
walletInfoModal.coinbase1: <0></0> is a mobile Ethereum OS for iOS and Android. You can get it <2>here</2> or use one of the links below.
walletInfoModal.coinbase2: If you already have <1></1>, open <3>faa.st</3> using its built in web browser.

createWalletModal.ack1: The <1></1> file can be used to send any funds it contains.
createWalletModal.ack2: The <1></1> file contains a sensitive private key that is encrypted and can only be accessed using the password I entered.
createWalletModal.ack3: Faast does not have a backup of the file or password. This <1></1> was generated in my web browser and was never sent over the internet.
createWalletModal.ack4: If I lose access to the file or forget the password I forfeit all funds it contains.
createWalletModal.ack5: I have downloaded and stored this file in a secure location on my computer.
createWalletModal.ack6: The <1></1> file, in combination with my password, can be used to send funds using applications other than Faast.

stepTwoManual.geoLimit: Please note: The maximum you can swap is <1></1> <3></3> <5>due to your location.</5>

accountSelect.heading: Please select the account you'd like to add.

assetSelect.addSpecific: Or, add a specific account by choosing one of the following supported currencies.

trezor.pin: If required, enter your pin or password to unlock the TREZOR
trezor.export: When asked if you want to export the public key of your <1></1> account, select <3>Export</3>
trezor.popup: If you see a 'Popup Closed' error, please enable popups in your browser settings and try again

ledger.connect: Connect your Ledger device to begin
ledger.pin: Enter your pin to unlock the Ledger
ledger.version: Ensure your Ledger firmware and <1></1> app are up to date using the Ledger Live desktop app

connectionStatus.unable: Unable to connect, trying again in <1><2>{{retrySeconds}}</2></1> seconds
